settings.title: Shopping Made Simple.
settings.text:
Buying your first fire feature can be an overwhelming process, that's why we created Fire Pit Surplus. With more than 25 outdoor heating brands, we guarantee to have the right fire pit for your needs.

Our support team is available 7 Days A Week via chat or phone 888-671-4611.

settings.title: Shop Our Wide Selection Of Outdoor Living Products

settings.heading: 13% Off EcoSmart & Heatscope
settings.text_content: As an authorized Ecosmart retailer, we are offering and exclusive 13% off our price. There's never been a better time to buy! Use code: ECO13 at checkout to redeem this deal.
